name: Enduring Fried Wild Greens
notes: 5 Endura Carrots overfills for 2 stamina wheels.

name: Enduring Meat Curry
notes: Overfills stamina wheel

name: Enduring Milk
notes: Restore and overfill stamina wheel.

name: Energizing Seafood Skewer
notes: Fills up to 3 stamina wheels

name: Enduring Salt-Grilled Prime Meat
notes: Each Endura Carrot added will increase the stamina overfill

name: Enduring Steamed Meat
notes: Overfills stamina wheel

name: Enduring Vegetable Curry
notes: Overfills stamina wheel

name: Energizing Mushroom Skewer
notes: * +1 Heart for each Hylian Shroom.

name: Energizing Fish Skewer
notes: Open flame, Any Fish will work

name: Energizing Salt-Grilled Fish
notes: Refills 3 stamina wheels.

name: Enduring Steamed Meat
notes: Overfills stamina wheel.

name: Enduring Steamed Mushrooms
notes: Fills stamina + 1 whole overfill wheel.

name: Energizing Glazed Meat
notes: Restores 1 ¾ stamina wheels.

name: Hasty Veggie Cream Soup
notes: Must be cooked while wearing the Dark Link costume.

name: Hasty Simmered Fruit
notes:
Has a chance of creating one of two elixers:
Restores four hearts and provides a low-level speed boost for 1:00 minute.
Restores seven hearts and provides a high-level speed boost for 30:00 minutes.
Use a Shard of a Dragon's Horn instead of the Monster Extract for a guaranteed high-level, 30 minute speed boost and 7¾ health recovery

name: Hearty Clam Chowder
notes: This recipe only works with the Hearty Blueshell Snail, any other snails will result in a different dish

name: Hearty Seafood Rice Balls
notes: This happened when using the Hearty Clam Chowder recipe. (Be careful not to put in rice instead of wheat. They're very similar.)

name: Hearty Seafood Rice Balls
notes: 17 extra hearts if made from 11:30-12:00 during bloodmoon.

name: Hearty Veggie Rice Balls
notes: If you use four Big Hearty Radish instead, it will result in a full recovery and 20 temporary Hearts.

name: Hearty Seafood Skewer
notes: 5 Snails = 15 temporary Hearts, 16 if cooked between 11:30-12:00 on a bloodmoon

name: Hearty Simmered Fruit
notes: Each Durian adds an extra 4 temporary Hearts for a maximum of 20.

name: Hearty Seafood Fried Rice
notes: You can probably replace the two blueshell snails with any seafood to get a different effect

name: Hearty Gourmet Meat and Seafood Fry
Hearty Monster Rice Balls
notes: Monster Extract causes a gamble. Possible to have only 1 extra heart.

name: Chilly Simmered Fruit
notes: recipe sometimes makes low level for 30 min., or mid level for 10 min

name: Apple Pie
notes: Tabantha Wheat, Cane Sugar & Goat Butter obtainable in Rito Village.

name: Apple Pie
notes: Tabantha Wheat, Cane Sugar & Goat Butter obtainable in Rito Village.

name: Baked Apple
notes: Open flame.

name: Baked Palm Fruit
notes: Open flame.

name: Blueshell Escargot
notes: Open flame.

name: Campfire Egg
notes: Open flame. Drop carefully on a surface above Link's feet, or the egg will break (recommend doing in Eldin, otherwise starting a fire near enough becomes difficult).

name: Carrot Cake
notes: Use only one type of carrot to add a special effect.

name: Curry Pilaf
notes: You can use any number of these ingredients, this is just the best recipe for heart recovery.

name: Egg Pudding
notes: Add extra ingredients to give it special effects or to increase the hearts restored

name: Fish and Mushroom Skewer
notes: Use other or more fish and mushrooms to increase hearts restored or add special effects.

name: Fish Skewer
notes: Use other fish or more fish to increase Hearts Restored, or to add special effects.

name: Fragrant Mushroom Saute
notes: Use more mushrooms and other types of mushrooms to increase the number of hearts it restores or to give it special effects.

name: Fried Wild Greens
notes: Use other vegetables or more vegetables to increase Hearts Restored, or to add special effects.

name: Fruit and Mushroom Mix
notes: Add other Fruits and Mushrooms to increase Hearts Restored, or to add special effects.

name: Fruit cake
notes: Always use two different fruits in this cake. You may switch the apples or Wildberries for other fruits to add special effects.

name: Fruit Pie
notes: Swap Wildberry for other fruit (such as Palm Fruit) for different results. Adding another fruit amplifies the healing effect. Hearts and price listed are with one Wildberry.

name: Glazed Meat
notes: Use only Raw meat and Courser Bee Honey to give the meal the Energizing Effect.

name: Glazed Mushrooms
notes: Switch the Endura Shroom for a Hylian Shroom or a Stamella Shroom to give it a stamina recovery effect (Energizing glazed mushrooms).

name: Glazed Veggies
notes: Switch the Cool Safflina for Hyrule Herbs to give the meal the Energizing Effect.

name: Gourmet Meat Curry
notes: You can use any Raw Meat except poultry to result in the same dish, but this restores the most hearts.

name: Gourmet Poultry Curry
notes: You can use any Raw Poultry to result in essentially the same dish, but with fewer restored hearts.

name: Hard Boiled Egg
notes: Drop into hot springs.

name: Herb Saute
notes: Use different herbs or more herbs for different effects.

name: Meat and Mushroom Skewer
notes: Use other or more Meat and Mushrooms to increase hearts restored or add special effects.

name: Meat and Rice Bowl
notes: Use different types of meat to increase the hearts restored

name: Meat and Seafood Fry
notes: Use other or more Meat and Fish to increase hearts restored or add special effects.

name: Meat Pie
notes: You can use any raw meat or poultry, but gourmet meat restores the most hearts.

name: Meat Skewer
notes: * Restores twice the number of hearts as the raw meat used. Any 1 meat will work

name: Meat Stew
notes: Use more or other types of meat to increase hearts restored

name: Meaty Rice Balls
notes: Use different types of meat to increase the number of hearts restored.

name: Milk
notes: Add extra ingredients to increase the hearts restored or add a special effect.

name: Monster Cake
notes: Restores 5 hearts during the Blood Moon.

name: Monster Curry
notes: Other additional combinations and effects untested.

name: Mushroom Rice Balls
notes: Use other or more mushrooms to increase the number of hearts restored or give it a special effect.

name: Mushroom risotto
notes: Use other or more mushrooms to increase hearts restored. Switch the Mushrooms for Hearty Salmon to get a fish lover's dish.

name: Mushroom Skewer
notes: Use other or more Mushrooms to restore more hearts or add special effects.

name: Nutcake
notes: The Acorn can be swapped for Chickaloo Tree Nuts

name: Omelet
notes: Add more ingredients to increase the number of hearts restored and add various effects.

name: Plain Crepe
notes: Add honey to get an Energizing Honeyed Crepe

name: Porgy Meunière
notes: Use only one type of porgy for different effects.

name: Poultry Pilaf
notes: Switch the drumsticks for any poultry meat to restores more hearts.

name: Roasted Acorn
notes: Open flame.

name: Roasted Bass
notes: Open flame.

name: Roasted Bird Drumstick
notes: Open flame.

name: Roasted Radish
notes: Open flame.

name: Salt-Grilled Greens
notes: Use more or other vegetables to increase the hearts restored or to give it a special effect.

name: Salt-Grilled Meat
notes: Use different meats to restores more hearts.

name: Salt-Grilled Mushrooms
notes: Use different mushrooms for varying effects.

name: Seafood Meunière
notes: Use other types of fish or more fish to increase hearts restored or add a special effect

name: Seafood Rice Balls
notes: Use different fish to increase hearts restored or to add a special effect.

name: Seared Gourmet Steak
notes: Open flame.

name: Seared Prime Steak
notes: Open flame.

name: Seared Steak
notes: Open flame.

name: Simmered Fruit
notes: Use other fruits or more fruits to restore more hearts or add special effects.

name: Spiced Meat Skewer
notes: Use more meat to give the dish more hearts.

name: Steamed Fish
notes: Use other or more Fish and Vegetables to increase hearts restored or give it a special effect.

name: Steamed Fruit
notes: Use other or more fruit and veg to increase hearts restored or add special effects.

name: Steamed Meat
notes: Use other or more \Meat and Vegetables to increase hearts restored or give it a special effect.

name: Steamed Mushrooms
notes: Using different herbs and mushrooms will change the number of hearts restored as well as possibly adding special effects.

name: Toasted Hearty Truffle
notes: Open flame.

name: Toasty Hylian Shroom
notes: Open flame.

name: Vegetable Curry
notes: This dish only seems to work with carrots

name: Veggie Rice Balls
notes: Use other or more vegetables or herbs to restore more hearts or add special effects.

name: Enduring Elixir
notes: stamina extended ¼-¾

name: Hasty Elixir
notes: *Requires Any 1 Monster Part* You can get a free one from Sagessa at the Dueling Peaks Stable.

name: Hasty Elixir
notes: *Requires any 1 Monster Part*

name: Fairy Tonic
notes: +7 Hearts healing per fairy added. Can be added to anything for 7 hearts healing addition ( w/ Monster Extract not tested ).

name: Electro Simmered Fruit
notes: long-lasting

name: Electro Prime Meat and Seafood Fry
notes: May randomly provide 13:30 minutes of protection

name: Tough Meat-Stuffed Pumpkin
notes: Add various seasoning to increase duration and effect

name: Tough Prime Meat and Rice Bowl
Tough Prime Meat and Seafood Fry
Spicy Pepper Steak
notes: Using Raw Prime Meat instead of Raw Meat will bring the heart restoration effect up to 7.

name: Spicy Mushroom Skewer
notes: Very easy-to-locate recipe as Sunshrooms are plentiful around Retsam Forest near the Hateno Tech Lab.

name: Spicy Mushroom Skewer
notes: Each Hylian Shroom added to the pot grants +1 Heart Restored and an additional +30 seconds of cold resist.

name: Spicy Meat and Seafood Fry
notes:
This is the recipe from the Old Man's Diary.
Add more Spicy Peppers to increase the duration.

name: Spicy Salt-Grilled Meat
notes: You can use almost any meat for similar results.

name: Spicy Simmered Fruit
notes: Add more fruit or Spicy Peppers to increase duration and hearts restored.

name: Spicy Fish Skewer
notes:
This recipe does involve a critical success (invoked by the dragon piece), which automatically goes towards boosting the effect strength.
Using fewer fairies can cause this effect to shift to boosting health. Using a lesser dragon part can cause it to shift to boosting duration.

name: Spicy Fruit and Mushroom Mix
notes: Possibly the most easily obtained meal for medium-level cold resist.

name: Mighty Simmered Fruit
notes: Must be cooked while wearing the Dark Link costume at night.

name: Mighty Steamed Fish
notes: Razorclaw Crab can be swapped out for Mighty Porgy

name: Mighty Prime Meat and Seafood Fry
